{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>Bey Herrn Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE> in <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT> <PRICE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE> in <FORMAT>groß 8v°.</FORMAT> von <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR> in <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>, ohngebunden <PRICE>46. kr.</PRICE>; gebunden in Leder und Schlotz † <PRICE>fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT> ohngebunden † <PRICE>6. Batzen;</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Anfang der Geographie</TITLE> <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT> <PRICE>6. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT> <PRICE>12. Batzen;</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE> <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT> <PRICE>18. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Gespräch von den Würmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE> † <PRICE>8. Rappen,</PRICE> und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.</BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":8,"explanation":"1) Replaced all malformed '<PRIZE>' tags with standard '<PRICE>' tags for consistency and validity.
2) Closed the '<BIBL>' element for 'Memoires de Rochester' which was left open before the next '<BIBL>' began.
3) Split the nested Maupertuis entry into its own '<BIBL>' block instead of leaving it embedded in the 'Memoires de Rochester' '<BIBL>'.
4) Corrected malformed encoding artifacts in '<FORMAT>' and text content (e.g., 'gro√ü 8v√≤.' to 'groß 8v°.', '8v√≤.' to '8v°.', 'Anf√§ng' to 'Anfang', 'Gespr√§ch' to 'Gespräch', 'W√ºrmen' to 'Würmen').
5) Normalized dagger and similar symbols (e.g., '†') from garbled sequences ('√†').
6) Ensured each bibliographic item has a single, well-formed '<BIBL>' block with properly nested '<TITLE>', '<AUTHOR>', '<FORMAT>', and '<PRICE>' tags.
7) Added a closing '</BIBL>' tag immediately after the 'Memoires de Rochester' price to avoid structural ambiguity.
8) Verified all opened XML tags are properly closed and the overall document is well-formed XML."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM>Bey Herrn Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE> in <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT> <PRICE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE> in <FORMAT>groß 8v°.</FORMAT> von <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR> in <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>, ohngebunden <PRICE>46. kr.</PRICE>; gebunden in Leder und Schlotz † <PRICE>fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT> ohngebunden † <PRICE>6. Batzen;</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Anfang der Geographie</TITLE> <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT> <PRICE>6. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT> <PRICE>12. Batzen;</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE> <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT> <PRICE>18. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Gespräch von den Würmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE> † <PRICE>8. Rappen,</PRICE> und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.</BIBL></ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
1) Replaced all malformed '<PRIZE>' tags with standard '<PRICE>' tags for consistency and validity.
2) Closed the '<BIBL>' element for 'Memoires de Rochester' which was left open before the next '<BIBL>' began.
3) Split the nested Maupertuis entry into its own '<BIBL>' block instead of leaving it embedded in the 'Memoires de Rochester' '<BIBL>'.
4) Corrected malformed encoding artifacts in '<FORMAT>' and text content (e.g., 'gro√ü 8v√≤.' to 'groß 8v°.', '8v√≤.' to '8v°.', 'Anf√§ng' to 'Anfang', 'Gespr√§ch' to 'Gespräch', 'W√ºrmen' to 'Würmen').
5) Normalized dagger and similar symbols (e.g., '†') from garbled sequences ('√†').
6) Ensured each bibliographic item has a single, well-formed '<BIBL>' block with properly nested '<TITLE>', '<AUTHOR>', '<FORMAT>', and '<PRICE>' tags.
7) Added a closing '</BIBL>' tag immediately after the 'Memoires de Rochester' price to avoid structural ambiguity.
8) Verified all opened XML tags are properly closed and the overall document is well-formed XML.
